archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Request Service Recovery Authorization
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Ensure authorization is received to proceed with the recovery plan.
